functions module

functions.GetBeamOffSet(tree, etype)[source]

This function returns appropriate beam offsets for different event types.

Parameters:

  • tree (Tree) – uproot Tree

  • etype (str) – event type: {Data, Mix, Jpsi, DY, PsiPrime}

Returns:

beam offsets

Return type:

numpy array
